body: Does anyone know a good recording software to use for windows 10 that is for free.
body_tagged: Does anyone know a good recording software to use for windows 10 that is for free.
title: Recording  Software for Windows 10 (For Free)

replies.body: Fraps. Wait, didn't you have a Mac?

replies.body:
I personally use Obs Studio and it's great , considering as well you can both record and stream from it. (if you need help setting it up add me on skype if you like , claw334)

If you don't want that you can get bandicam but it has a watermark at the top.

replies.body: You can use the inbuilt recorder of Windows 10, it does not lag my computer and is the best recorder for me at least. Press WIN + G to open the recorder in any game.
replies.body_tagged: You can use the inbuilt recorder of Windows 10, it does not lag my computer and is the best recorder for me at least. Press WIN + G to open the recorder in any game.
